variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for Yukon 2025 tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 14% on the portion of income up to $53,255. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 19% on the portion of income over $53,255 up to $106,495. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 24% on the portion of income over $106,495 up to $129,590. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 25.75% on the portion of income over $129,590. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_4 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all four brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
